bibl.title: ] LDAB 1998. Leuven Database of Ancient Books.
bibl.note: The database contains basic information on more than 7,000 literary texts and updates both the catalogue of Pack and that of van Haelst. It works with the program FileMaker Pro and can be used both on Mac and PC.
bibl.seg: [CLARYSSE Willy, with the collaboration of Jacques FRANCE, Peter VAN MINNEN and Herbert VERRETH,] LDAB 1998. Leuven Database of Ancient Books.
Leuven, Katholieke Universiteit Leuven - tu.be, 1998, 1 CD-ROM. $20.
